markdownRemark.html: I've been taking some guitar lessons. Finally trying to learn some stuff like the circle of fifths. My homework this week was to write some chord progressions in C major. This is the first one that sorta feels like it could be a song. It's a little rough and needs some practice, but maybe worth sharing? Over the coming weeks I'll be working my way around the circle of fifths, writing little progressions in each.
